name: crontab.freebsd.vim
description:
Crontab syntax, with FreeBSD extensions.
Understands comments, environment variable assignmnents, date parts extensions (ranges, steps), @reboot etc, and some highlighting for executed commands (strings, percent sign).
install_details: Copy script into ~/.vim/syntax directory, and modify ~/.vim/filetype.vim to pick this one instead of default crontab.vim.
